title: radioStopConditions
description:
Controls when an ongoing operation completes. 

If this element is absent (or empty), the radio will continue trying to inventory tags until a "stop" is issued.

duration.description: Time to run until radio stops (in seconds)

antennaCycles.description: The number of cycles through all enabled antennas before stopping the radio

tagCount.description: The number of tags to inventory until the radio stops. Cannot be set at the same time as durationAfterNoMoreUniqueTags

durationAfterNoMoreUniqueTags.description: Duration (in seconds) after not inventorying any more unique tags to stop the radio. Cannot be set at the same time as tagCount
